title: jglr in lobby banned a teammates champ then stole my champ, which is a supp to jg with them.
body:
this games gonna be swell!


edit, game just ended. jglr (as yuumi) wouldnt leave toplane, cause our toplaner to quit and afk farm jg the rest of the game. set me and the adc behind aswell. only one who did good was mid. auto loss.
